title: Activate Deal Request
description: Request parameters for activating a deal on a specific destination platform

deal_id.description: The unique identifier for the deal to activate

destinations.description: Target destination platform(s) for activation. If the authenticated caller matches one of these destinations, activation keys will be included in the response.

context.description: Initiator-provided context included in the request payload. Agents must echo this value back unchanged in responses and webhooks. Use for UI/session hints, correlation tokens, or tracking metadata.
